tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    protocol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    packet_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE intrusion_attempts (
    attempt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    protocol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    threat_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE malicious_activities (
    id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    activity_type VARCHAR,
    severity INT,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE intrusions (
    id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    intrusion_type VARCHAR,
    intrusion_method VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    data_transfer INT
);

CREATE TABLE malicious_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    activity_description TEXT,
    threat_level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(log_id) REFERENCES network_traffic_logs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE intrusion_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    attempt_type VARCHAR(50),
    attempt_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY(log_id) REFERENCES network_traffic_logs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE detected_intrusions (
    intrusion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attempt_id INT,
    intrusion_type VARCHAR(50),
    detection_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY(attempt_id) REFERENCES intrusion_attempts(attempt_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    port INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE malicious_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    activity_description TEXT,
    detected_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES network_traffic_logs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE intrusions (
    intrusion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    intrusion_type VARCHAR(50),
    intrusion_detected_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES network_traffic_logs(log_id)
);
